nodes.bodyText: Can you use a different value for category and event_type, please?

did it the same cause using default event.category in one test and overwriting with event_type event category field in another test, while keeping the query beginning "process where" the same. surely can use whatever for the sake of testing. will update.
You could use the randomXXX() methods instead for arbitrary values or randomBoolean() to select which one should be used. This has the advantage of trying different combinations for all documents.
